title: FOR HONOR !!! - Gratis en Steam - Starter Edition

embed.description: Carve a path of destruction through an intense, believable battlefield in For Honor.

body: **Obtengan la Starter Edition de este juegazo a travéz de Steam, totalmente Gratis !!!**
